statements: SELECT * FROM software_tools;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name FROM software_tools WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT tool_name, description FROM software_tools ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM software_tools WHERE tool_id > 3;
SELECT tool_name, description, researcher_id FROM software_tools WHERE tool_name LIKE 'Python%';
SELECT tool_name, description FROM software_tools WHERE tool_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM software_tools WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT tool_name, description FROM software_tools WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT tool_name, description FROM software_tools WHERE researcher_id = 3 ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, description FROM software_tools WHERE researcher_id = 4 LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM software_tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_category FROM software_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Data Analysis';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM software_tools WHERE tool_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM software_tools ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_category FROM software_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Visualization' ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_tools;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name FROM software_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Data Analysis';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM software_tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Data Processing' AND tool_name LIKE '%ETL%';
SELECT workflow_name, tool_name FROM research_workflows JOIN software_tools ON research_workflows.workflow_tool_id = software_tools.tool_id;
SELECT * FROM tools;
SELECT tool_name, version FROM tools WHERE version > 1.0;
SELECT tool_name, description FROM tools WHERE tool_id = 3;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY institution DESC;
SELECT workflow_name, researcher_name FROM workflow JOIN researchers ON workflow.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM tools WHERE version > 2.0;
SELECT tool_name, version FROM tools WHERE tool_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT researcher_name, institution, field_of_study FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tools.tool_name, workflow.workflow_name FROM tools JOIN workflow ON tools.tool_id = workflow.workflow_id;
SELECT researcher_name, institution, workflow_name FROM researchers JOIN workflow ON researchers.researcher_id = workflow.researcher_id ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM SoftwareTools WHERE tool_language = 'Python';
SELECT workflow_name FROM QuantumSimulationWorkflows WHERE workflow_status = 'Completed';
SELECT researcher_id, tool_id FROM ResearcherTools WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_language FROM SoftwareTools WHERE tool_language = 'Python';
SELECT * FROM QuantumSimulationWorkflows WHERE workflow_status = 'Complete' ORDER BY workflow_id DESC;

SELECT Researchers.researcher_name, SoftwareTools.tool_name FROM ResearcherTools JOIN Researchers ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearcherTools.researcher_id JOIN SoftwareTools ON SoftwareTools.tool_id = ResearcherTools.tool_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY institution ASC;
SELECT * FROM software_tools WHERE tool_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT tool_name, description FROM software_tools WHERE tool_id = 1;
SELECT tool_name, version_number FROM software_tools INNER JOIN tool_versions ON software_tools.tool_id = tool_versions.tool_id;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, institution FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM software_tools WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, description FROM software_tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers JOIN simulation_workflows ON researchers.researcher_id = simulation_workflows.researcher_id WHERE workflow_id = 1;
SELECT tool_name, version_number, description FROM software_tools JOIN tool_versions ON software_tools.tool_id = tool_versions.tool_id;
